What is the Necronomicon known for in the Cthulhu Mythos?
The Necronomicon is encyclopedic and baffling, containing deep Mythos magic and knowledge.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be opened by a chant to Yog-Sothoth in the Necronomicon?
The Way to this world
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Necronomicon discuss in terms of existence?
The nature of existence
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the Necronomicon on humans?
The gateway to insanity, the path through which humans pass, metamorphose, and emerge unrecognizable

What can be found in the Necronomicon regarding the powder of Ibn-Ghazi?
Information

Who wrote the original version of the Necronomicon, known as the Kitab Al Azif?
Abdul Al-Hazred (Abd al-Azrad)

When was the original version of the Necronomicon, known as the Kitab Al Azif, written?
around 730 A.D.

In which city was Abdul Al-Hazred born?
Sanaa, Yemen
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Abdul Al-Hazred's occupation?
student of magic, astronomer, poet, philosopher, and scientist

How old was Abdul Al-Hazred when he died?
he died in his 30s
